file.name: data_exchange_layer.yaml
file.content:
components:
  schemas:
    tmp0:
      properties:
        success: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp1:
      properties:
        success: {type: string}
      type: object
  securitySchemes: {}
info:
  contact: {email: frikky@shuffler.io, name: '@frikkylikeme', url: 'https://twitter.com/frikkylikeme'}
  description: Automated generation of McAfee Data Exchange Layer
  title: McAfee Data Exchange Layer
  version: 1.0.0
  x-logo: data:image/png;base64,
openapi: 3.0.2
paths:
  tmp0:
    post:
      description: Push an Open Topic Common Threat Event to Data Exchange Layer
      parameters:
      - description: DXL Topic to post message to
        example: /open/threat/v1/[category]/[company_name]
        in: query
        name: DXL Topic
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Event Category
        example: Host intrusion buffer overflow
        in: query
        name: Event Category
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Event ID
        example: '18052'
        in: query
        name: Event ID
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Threat Type
        example: Exploit Prevention
        in: query
        name: Threat Type
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: 142E1D688EF0568370C37187FD9F2351D7DDEDA574F8BFA9B0FA4EF42DB85AA2
        in: query
        name: Sha-256
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: MD5 of File associated with threat
        example: F2C7BB8ACC97F92E987A2D4087D021B1
        in: query
        name: File MD5
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Name of file associated with threat
        example: notepad.exe
        in: query
        name: File Name
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Received UTC of event
        example: '2017-06-23T23:24:04.000Z'
        in: query
        name: Received UTC
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: target protocol of threat
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Protocol
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Target Hostname of threat
        example: MCAFEE-EUOI3UJK
        in: query
        name: Hostname
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Size of File
        example: '59560'
        in: query
        name: File Size
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: 'False'
        in: query
        name: Target Trusted
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: '2009-11-5T17:23:23.000Z'
        in: query
        name: Modify Time
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Target port of threat
        example: '0'
        in: query
        name: Target Port
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: IEXPLORE.EXE
        in: query
        name: Process Name
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: 10.0.0.2
        in: query
        name: Target IPv4
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: 'True'
        in: query
        name: Target Parent Process Trusted
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Target IPv6
        example: 0:0:0:0:0:FFFF:0A00:0002
        in: query
        name: Target IPv6
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: 5746bd7e255dd6a8afa06f7c42c1ba41
        in: query
        name: Target Parent Process Hash
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: CMD.EXE
        in: query
        name: Target Parent Process Name
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: '2016-12-12T14:48:09.000Z'
        in: query
        name: Target Access Time
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: O=MCAFEE, OU=BEAENG, CN=MCAFEE TEST
        in: query
        name: Target Signer
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: /DAC/IEXPLORE.EXE
        in: query
        name: Target Filename
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Target Mac
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: '2016-12-12T14:48:09.000Z'
        in: query
        name: Target Create Time
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: 'True'
        in: query
        name: Is Target Signed
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: MCAFEE-EUOI3UJK/Administrator
        in: query
        name: Target Username
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: True/False if parent process is signed
        example: 'True'
        in: query
        name: Target Is Parent Process Signed
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: IEXPLORE.EXE
        in: query
        name: Target Name
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: C=US, S=WASHINGTON, L=REDMOND, O=MICROSOFT CORPORATION, OU=MOPR,
          CN=MICROSOFT WINDOWS
        in: query
        name: Parent Process Signer
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: dd3328a71fa66e20274ed10f7e864d9d
        in: query
        name: Target Hash
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: C:/DAC
        in: query
        name: Target Path
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Json object of other data
        example: '{''other'': ''data''}'
        in: query
        name: Other Data
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: URI
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: '2016-11-18T22:28:12Z'
        in: query
        name: Analyzer Content Creation Date
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: 10.5.0
        in: query
        name: Analyzer Version
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: MCAFEE-EUOI3UJK
        in: query
        name: Analyzer Host Name
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: Exploit Prevention
        in: query
        name: Anaylzer Detection Method
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: '005345000002'
        in: query
        name: Analyzer MAC
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: '428'
        in: query
        name: Analyzer Rule ID
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Analyzer Engine Version
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: ENDP_AM_1020
        in: query
        name: Analyzer ID
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: McAfee Endpoint Security
        in: query
        name: Analyzer Name
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: '2016-12-15T22:18:34.000Z'
        in: query
        name: Analyzer Detected UTC
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: 10.5.0.7380
        in: query
        name: Analyzer Content Version
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: 10.0.0.2
        in: query
        name: Analyzer IPv4
        required: false

      - description: ''
        example: 0:0:0:0:0:FFFF:0A00:0002
        in: query
        name: Analyzer IPv6
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: None
        in: query
        name: Entity Group Name
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: None
        in: query
        name: Entity Session ID
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: Server
        in: query
        name: Entity OS Platform
        required: false

      - description: ''
        example: Windows 2000
        in: query
        name: Entity OS Type
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: GlobalRoot/Directory/Lost&Found/SIM[KLEONARD-DE]
        in: query
        name: Entity Node Text Path
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: AnalyzerDetectionMethod
        in: query
        name: Entity Rule Name
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: device
        in: query
        name: Entity Type
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ''
        example: 4B4F273D-E7E8-4FF1-B8A4-B69690CB9619
        in: query
        name: Entity ID
        required: false

      - description: ''

      - description: ''

      description: Push an Event to Data Exchange Layer
      parameters:
      - description: JSON Message to push to  Data Exchange Layer
        example: ''

        schema: {type: string}
      - description: ' Data Exchange Layer Topic to send Message to.'
